name: Mongounit
tagline: PHPUnit extension for test cases that utilize MongoDB as their data source.
body:
Mongounit is a PHPUnit extension for test cases that utilize MongoDB as their data source. An [example test case](https://github.com/zumba/mongounit/blob/master/examples/PizzaTest.php) has been provided to show the ease of use.

__Current Version__: v1.1

[![Build Status](https://secure.travis-ci.org/zumba/mongounit.png)](http://travis-ci.org/zumba/mongounit)

## Requirements

* PHP 5.3+
* PECL mongo 1.3+

## Testing

After cloning the repo, simply `cd` to the cloned directly and run:

```shell
$ phpunit
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
